thread.title_full: Always perfect - Review of Le Relais du Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mary C
title: Always perfect
text: My husband and I stayed here for 4 nights recently. I've stayed here before and every time it's been perfect. The staff are always so quick to respond via email to any queries beforehand and are so accommodating with any requests. The location is very central, all the main tourist attractions are within easy walking distance. This hotel is cosy, the beds super comfortable and basically there's nothing that I would change. You won't regret booking a stay here.
